title: I will be your full-stack web developer (frontend + backend)
subtitle: Custom Website Development (Your vision, I Create)
excerpt:
At the end of the project, the client receives:

  • Fully functional, responsive full-stack website

  • Source code (frontend + backend + database)

  • Deployment on live server with custom domain

  • Documentation and credentials

  • Optional support or maintenance plan
body:
• Project Setup & Planning

    Requirements gathering and technical consultation Tech stack selection (e.g., React, Next.js, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, etc.) Architecture planning and API structure design Project timeline and milestone breakdown

  • Frontend Development

    Responsive UI built with modern frameworks (React, Next.js, or Vue) Pixel-perfect implementation of your design (Figma, Adobe XD, etc.) Cross-browser and mobile optimization Component-based, maintainable structure Basic animations and interactivity (Framer Motion or CSS animations)

  • Backend Development

    RESTful or GraphQL API creation Database design and integration (MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL, etc.) Authentication & authorization (JWT, OAuth, etc.) CRUD operations for all key features File upload, email notifications, and other utilities

  • Integration & Functionality

    Third-party API integration (Stripe, Firebase, AWS, etc.) Admin dashboard or CMS integration (optional) Payment gateway setup (if required) Real-time updates (WebSockets or Socket.IO) Deployment pipelines and CI/CD setup (optional)

  • Testing & Quality Assurance

    Unit and integration testing for key modules Manual and automated testing of core features Cross-browser and device testing Bug fixing and performance tuning

  • Deployment & Delivery

    Deployment to production environment (Vercel, AWS, DigitalOcean, etc.) Domain and SSL setup Version control (GitHub/GitLab) handover Environment variables and credentials documentation

  • Documentation & Handover

    Project documentation (README, API docs, or Notion handoff) Source code with full access and structure explained Admin guide or training session (if applicable) Post-launch support window (7–30 days based on plan)

Budgets:

Minimum

Standard

Pro

  • Start At 1000$

  • Fully functional website

  • Delivery days: 3-7 days

  • Start At 1500$

  • Fully functional website, plus APIs, deployment setup

  • Delivery days: 7 - 10 days

  • Start At 2000$

  • Everything you can think of

  • Delivery days: Pace you can define, have fully support in lifetime

Let’s collaborate

Have a roadmap, a stubborn bug, or a moonshot in mind? I’m all ears.

Send a note to giang.dlinh@gmail.com with a short brief, a timeline, and any handy context. I’ll reply within 48 hours with next steps and a plan to get things moving.

title: I will be your Shopware Developer
subtitle: Shopware Shop Development (Your image, I transform)
excerpt:
At the end of the project, the client receives:

  • Fully functional Shopware store or plugin

  • Source code and assets

  • Setup and user documentation

  • Testing report / QA summary

  • (Optional) post-launch support or update plan
body:
• Shopware Store Setup & Configuration

    Installation and environment setup (Shopware 6 or 5) Configuration of store settings (languages, currencies, taxes, shipping, and payment methods) Integration with hosting and domain Basic performance optimization and cache configuration

  • Theme Development / Customization

    Custom Shopware storefront theme or layout based on your brand guidelines Responsive, mobile-friendly design Styling adjustments using Twig, SCSS, and JavaScript Integration of custom banners, typography, and color palette QA and cross-browser testing

  • Plugin / Extension Development

    Development of custom plugins or extensions (Shopware 6 plugin system) Documentation of plugin functionality and installation steps Testing and debugging for compatibility with your Shopware version Optional: publishing setup for Shopware Store or private plugin distribution

  • Third-Party Integrations

    Integration with payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal, etc.) Shipping and logistics APIs (DHL, UPS, etc.) CRM, ERP, or marketing tools (Mailchimp, HubSpot, etc.) Data sync or automation via API

  • Product & Catalog Setup

    Bulk import or configuration of product categories, variants, and attributes SEO-friendly product descriptions, URLs, and meta tags Stock and pricing configuration Data migration from another platform (optional)

  • Testing & Quality Assurance

    Functional testing of store features (checkout, search, cart, filters) Cross-device and browser compatibility testing Bug fixing and optimization before handover

  • Documentation & Handover

    Admin and maintenance documentation (how to manage products, orders, etc.) Code and plugin documentation (if applicable) Deployment notes and credentials handover Optional: walk-through session (recorded or live)

  • Optional Add-ons (if you offer ongoing support)

    Post-launch support (e.g., 30 days bug fixing or maintenance) Continuous updates (Shopware patches or version upgrades) Performance tuning and SEO audit Custom feature requests

Budgets:

Minimum

Standard

Pro

  • Start At 500$

  • Fully functional website

  • Delivery days: 3-7 days

  • Start At 1000$

  • Fully functional website, plus APIs, deployment setup

  • Delivery days: 7 - 10 days

  • Start At 1500$

  • Everything you can think of

  • Delivery days: Pace you can define, have fully support in lifetime

Let’s collaborate

Have a roadmap, a stubborn bug, or a moonshot in mind? I’m all ears.

Send a note to giang.dlinh@gmail.com with a short brief, a timeline, and any handy context. I’ll reply within 48 hours with next steps and a plan to get things moving.
